segments.text: I ’ m ready to settle the bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope you enjoyed your stay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ? I only stayed three nights .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right , sir . Three nights at 500 dollars a night ... that comes to $ 1,500 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But your brochure said that this was a package deal and the hotel ’ s services were all-inclusive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . The meals and excursions were included in the hotel price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But why are you overcharging me almost a thousand dollars ? 250 dollars a night , times three nights should just be $ 750 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry sir . The 250 - dollar rate is based on double occupancy . That means it ’ s 250 per person . The room itself is 500 dollars a night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps I could talk to your manager ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . Just a minute ; I ’ ll get her .
segments.speaker: S2
